name: State (modal)
xml:
<field
	type="ModalSelect"
	name="state"
	label="State"
	sql_title_table="#__###component###_state"
	sql_title_column="name"
	sql_title_key="guid"
	urlSelect="index.php?option=com_###component###&view=states&layout=modal&tmpl=component&titleKey=guid"
	urlNew="index.php?option=com_###component###&task=state.add&layout=modal&tmpl=component"
	urlEdit="index.php?option=com_###component###&task=state.edit&guid={id}&layout=modal&tmpl=component&titleKey=guid"
	titleSelect="Select A State"
	titleNew="New State"
	titleEdit="Edit State"
	iconSelect="icon-copy"
	select="true"
	new="true"
	edit="true"
	clear="true"
	required="true"
	class="input-large"
	description="Please select the state this ###view### belongs to."
	hint="Select a State"
/>
